title: Virginia Giuffre: Prince Andrew accuser seeks evidence he could not sweat
description: Lawyers for Virginia Giuffre call on the royal to submit medical reports to a New York court.

title: French ban on plastic packaging for fruit and vegetables begins
description: Effective from New Year's day, officials hope the law will prevent a billion items of single use plastics every year.

title: New Year Honours: Whitty, Van-Tam and Blair knighted, Lumley and Redgrave made dames
description: Athletes, actresses, campaigners, Tony Blair, a Spice Girl, and an 11-year-old boy are also honoured.

title: Whitty and Van-Tam: Dancer, football fan, knights
description: The government advisers, newly knighted, have been thrust into the spotlight. But what makes them tick?

title: New Year Honours 2022: Jason Kenny receives a knighthood and Laura Kenny made a dame
description: Jason Kenny receives a knighthood and Laura Kenny is made a dame in the New Year Honours, with an OBE for Tom Daley and MBE for Emma Raducanu.

title: New Year Honours: Political veteran Frank Field given exclusive honour
description: The former Labour minister, a friend of late PM Margaret Thatcher, becomes a Companion of Honour.

title: New Year Honours 2022: Wales' Covid heroes recognised
description: A supermarket worker thought her letter marked "On Her Majesty's Service" was a speeding ticket.

title: New Year Honours 2022: Lumley and Redgrave become dames
description: Actresses Joanna Lumley and Vanessa Redgrave are among the stars on the New Year Honours list.

title: New Year Honours: Chief Medical Officer Gregor Smith knighted
description: Dr Gregor Smith and Olympic swimmer Duncan Scott are among Scots recognised by the Queen.

title: Blair becomes 'Sir Tony' and joins top royal order
description: Tony Blair, the Duchess of Cornwall, and Baroness Amos are appointed to the Order of the Garter.

title: Betty White, the Golden Girl with a heart of gold, dies
description: One of America's original screen stars, Betty White enjoyed a career spanning eight decades.

title: Desmond Tutu: Body of South African hero to be aquamated
description: In line with his eco-friendly beliefs, the water-based process uses a tenth of the energy of cremation.

title: Tracy Beaker star Dani Harmer 'fine' after hospital drama during panto
description: Heavily pregnant Dani Harmer says she's fine after leaving Cinderella mid-performance.

title: New Year's Eve: Firework displays welcome 2022
description: Celebrations are under way across the world to usher in the New Year.

title: Cancelo in Man City squad to face Arsenal despite being injured in robbery
description: Joao Cancelo will be part of Manchester City's squad to face Arsenal on Saturday, with the full-back determined to play despite being injured in a robbery at his home.

title: Breakaway Super League, Tokyo's 'Covid Games', cricket's racism crisis - a huge year for sports news
description: BBC sports editor Dan Roan says 2021 has included two of the most dramatic, fastest-moving stories he has covered in two decades of sports reporting.

title: Ashes, World Cup & Commonwealth Games - why 2022 is a defining year for England women
description: With the Ashes, a World Cup and the Commonwealth Games coming up, BBC Sport looks at why 2022 could be a defining year for England.

title: Southampton v Newcastle off & Liverpool have new Covid cases among players
description: Newcastle United's Premier League game at Southampton is postponed because of the number of Covid-19 cases and injuries in the Magpies squad.

title: Watford accused of 'baring fangs' as striker Dennis drops out of Nigeria's Afcon squad
description: Watford's Emmanuel Dennis and fellow striker Victor Osimhen both drop out of Nigeria's squad for the Africa Cup of Nations.

title: Lukaku comments 'bring noise we don't need', says Chelsea boss Tuchel
description: Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel says Romelu Lukaku's comments in an interview in which the striker said he was "not happy" with his role at the club "brings noise that we don't need".

title: Colorado Wildfires: Thousands evacuated as buildings burn
description: Around 30,000 people have been evacuated as wildfires sweep across the US state of Colorado.

title: What are the Covid self-isolation rules now?
description: People in England, Wales and Northern Ireland can now stop self-isolating after seven days.

title: Most defeats, most ducks, most collapses - England's 'record-breakingly bad' year
description: Andy Zaltzman digs out the statistics that show how England's savage Ashes defeat caps a woeful year for Joe Root's side.
